at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight.ui

Class ImageButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight.ui.Button
      • at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight.ui.ImageButton

  • public abstract class ImageButton
extends Button
    Button for SurfaceView with images. Currently only used for the pause button.
    Author:
    Felix Kugler

                   android.graphics.Bitmap pressedBitmap,

        Constructs a new ImageButton at the given position with the given Bitmaps.
        Parameters:
        releasedBitmap - Image used for released state.
        pressedBitmap - Image used for pressed state.
        x - X coordinate of the center of the button.
        y - Y coordinate of the center of the button.

      • ImageButton

                   java.lang.String text,

        Constructs a new ImageButton at the given position with the given Bitmaps and the given caption.
        Parameters:
        font - Font used for caption.
        text - Caption on the button.
        releasedBitmap - Image used for released state.
        pressedBitmap - Image used for pressed state.
        x - X coordinate of the center of the button.
        y - Y coordinate of the center of the button.
